div.div: Case Western Reserve vs. Wash. & Jeff.

tr.td: CWR wins toss; defers. W&J will receive. CWR to kick left to right.
Hopkins kickoff 55 yards to the WJC10, Max Creighan return 18 yards to the WJC28 (KJ Pederson).
Ryan Ruffing rush for 3 yards to the WJC31 (Gavin Sandidge).
